title: "Retail tech startup Mason to raise $100M"
excerpt: "Mason, an e-commerce infrastructure provider, plans to raise $100 million over the next two years, co-founders Kausambi Manjita and Barada Sahu tell Axios exclusively. Why it matters: By harnessing AI, the San Francisco-based online shopping engine is helping retailers become multi- or omnichannel."
